job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Hello Software EngineerltbrgtltbrgtFreeosk is looking for a Software Engineer to join our Technology team This position will own the process of automating functional testing of our kiosk application and contribute to its feature and functionality evolution Our ideal candidate has experience developing durable ReactJS or Electron based applications strong functional testing skills and a testing oriented mindsetltbrgtltbrgtOur HQ is in Chicago but you can be located within the continental United States There will be travel required to our Chicago office from time to timeltbrgtltbrgtKey responsibilities for this roleltbrgtltulgtltligtImprove the durability of the Kiosk application through code enhancements technical reviews and documentationltligtltligtDesign and execute a functional test suite for the kiosk applicationltligtltligtAutomate the functional critical path testing of the kiosk applicationltligtltligtContribute to debugging and addressing field issues related to the kiosk applicationltligtltligtReview kiosk application pull requests and provide feedbackltligtltligtContribute to the forward vision of the kiosk appltligtltulgtYour skills background and experience includeltbrgtltulgtltligt2 years professional experience with React ReactJS and NodeJSltligtltligt3 years of professional development experience ltligtltligt3 years of experience using GitltligtltligtKnowledge of Unix based operating systems a plusltligtltligtKnowledge of all or any is a plus C Java Ruby PythonltligtltligtExcellent written and verbal communication skillsltligtltligtAbility to prioritize daily activities based on project goals established by managementltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggt Our Benefits ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtCompetitive payltligtltligt401k Match ProgramltligtltligtMedical Dental Vision InsuranceltligtltligtWork From Home StipendltligtltligtShort Term and Long Term DisabilityltligtltligtLife InsuranceltligtltligtPaid Time OffltligtltligtVolunteer OpportunitiesltligtltligtSummer HoursltligtltligtParental LeaveltligtltligtTuition ReimbursementltligtltligtSabbatical ProgramltligtltligtProfessional DevelopmentltligtltligtGym StipendltligtltligtFree Divvy membershipltligtltligtSocial eventsltligtltulgtWho are weltbrgtltbrgtFreeosk uses the power of free to fuel the product discovery process speeding the connection between consumers and the brands they love We have smartkiosks in more than 1300 retail locations across the United States We count over 70 of CPG companies in the Fortune 500 as customers and every one of those in the Fortune 100 We expect to aggressively expand our network of kiosks over the next few yearsltbrgtltbrgtWe are a nimble Chicagobased omnichannel marketing platform made up of a crossdisciplinary team of engineers creatives data analysts account managers and other specialists We help brands advance their key marketing initiatives using our patented technology and a unique database of realworld consumer intent signalsltbrgtltbrgtFreeosk is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer We do not discriminate based upon race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation gender identity gender expression age status as a protected veteran status as an individual with a disability or other applicable legally protected characteristics
